alert.note: Alert for Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ogle and central Lee Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Polo to near Woodhaven Lakes. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Brief landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Woodhaven Lakes around 435 PM CDT. Sublette around 440 PM CDT. Lost Nation around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Woosung, Grand Detour, Lee Center, Nachusa and Eldena. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 51 and 62. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
